fields.label: Event Type
fields.name: single_date_boolean
fields.instructions: Set to single day if the event lasts only for a day. Select multiple days if the event will span a range of dates.

fields.label: Is this a major event?
fields.name: major_event
fields.instructions: Major events shows up larger in the events page.

fields.label: Featured Posts/Pages
fields.name: featured_posts
fields.instructions:
- Drag the handle on the left side of a row to move the row around for rearranging.
- Click the minus (-) icon on the right side of a row to delete it.
- Click the up arrow icon on the upper left side of the row to minimize it.

sub_fields.label: Custom Title
sub_fields.name: custom_title
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank if you want the post's original title to be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Custom Background
sub_fields.name: custom_background
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank if you want the post's original featured image to be displayed.

fields.label: Address to Display
fields.name: location_address
fields.instructions: This will be the address that will be shown on this location's page. No address will be shown if left blank.

fields.label: Make this post more significant
fields.name: significant
fields.instructions: If checked, it will show bigger on the blog posts page.

fields.label: Use Alternate Hero Banner
fields.name: use_temporary_hero_banner
fields.instructions: If turned on the website will show the alternate hero banner instead.

sub_fields.label: Hero Banner Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the hero banner's featured image. Leave blank to default to the original hero banner. Only PNG type image is allowed.

sub_fields.label: Hero Banner Link Text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, it will display "Learn More" instead.

sub_fields.label: Hero Banner Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: This is the hero banner's featured image. Leave blank to default to the original hero banner. Only PNG type image is allowed.

sub_fields.label: Hero Banner Link Text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, it will display "Learn More" instead.

sub_fields.label: Outreach Section Parallax Effect Strength
sub_fields.name: outreach_parallax_strength
sub_fields.instructions:
Determines the intensity of the parallax effect on the outreach segment. 

Warning: the higher the parallax effect, the more that the image will be enlarged.

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video_youtube
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the YouTube URL of your video

fields.label: Fallback Thumbnail
fields.name: fallback_thumbnail
fields.instructions: Select an image to determine which thumbnail will be shown for the event item in case that article doesn't have its own thumbnail.

fields.label: Featured Blog Posts
fields.name: featured_blog_posts
fields.instructions: Featured posts will be shown before latest posts in the blog slider. Up to 7 featured posts.

fields.label: Address to display
fields.name: address_to_display
fields.instructions: This is the address that will show on the event page instead of the one specified in the Google map field.
